The Mamas & The Papas ‎– Dedicated To The One I Love

Label:
Dunhill ‎– D-4077
Format:
Vinyl, 7", 45 RPM
Country:
US
Released:
1967
Genre:
Rock
Style:
Classic Rock

Tracklist Hide Credits

A Dedicated To The One I Love
Written-By – Pauling*, Bass*
 2:56
B Free Advice
Written-By – John Phillips, Michelle Gilliam
 3:15

Companies, etc.

  • Published By – Trousdale Music Publishers, Inc.
  • Record Company – ABC-Paramount Records, Inc.

Credits

  • Producer – Lou Adler

Notes

This version is distinguishable by the ABC-Paramount Records, Inc. company credited in white text printed along the lower perimeter of both labels, whereas on the other versions the company credited is ABC Records, Inc., which was established in 1967 subsequent to this version's release.

Barcode and Other Identifiers

  • Matrix / Runout (Label side A): 00999
  • Matrix / Runout (Label side B): 01057
  • Matrix / Runout (Run-out area side A [hand-etched]): 00999-RE-2
  • Matrix / Runout (Run-out area side B [hand-etched]): 01057-2
  • Rights Society: BMI
